works.description: Kreoo, the newest brand of Italian firm Decormarmi created by Italian designer Enzo Berti, offers a line of unusually inviting consoles, tables and stools. “Kreoo” is inspired by the Greek word “kraino,” which means to produce or create. At this year’s Salone del Mobile in Milan, Kreoo presented the Island seating unit, designed again by Enzo Berti. The aerial view of the Kreoo Island above represents the typical forms of tropical coral reefs found in the Indian Ocean and the Pacific. You can always opt for a single piece, but the real beauty of the Island collection can be seen when you arrange two or more pieces in some order.
